tasks.name: Use Markdown to make some text **bold** or *italic*

You can also use other Markdown features such as [links](https://github.com/mstijak/tdo) or lists.
        
* Item 1
* Item 2
* Item 3
You can customize task highlighting in Settings. #idea

Add some custom CSS and override background or text color of the whole application. #idea
        
Hint: `body { color: lightblue }`
Use arrow keys to navigate lists and tasks
Hit `Enter` to edit the selected task
Hit `Space` to mark the task deleted
Press the `Insert` key to insert a new task at cursor position
Press the `Delete` key to delete the selected task
Use `Ctrl` + `Up/Down/Left/Right` arrow keys to move the selected task around
Double click on the list header to edit the list
Double click on a task to edit it
Hit Add Board (on the top) and enjoy **`tdo`**!
